CustomField.description: US-0009161 - [Ads 2020] Migrate Formulas from Revenue 2 to Ad Product
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Billing_Category__c , "Fix Price", 1, "CPM",IF (Days_delivered__c > 0 && Booked_Quantity__c > 0, (Runtime_Days__c / Days_delivered__c) * ( Delivered_AI_LT__c / Booked_Quantity__c),0),
"CPC" ,IF (Days_delivered__c > 0 && Booked_Quantity__c > 0, (Runtime_Days__c / Days_delivered__c) * ( IF(Product2__r.Callisto__c , Callisto_Clicks_Recorded_LT__c, Clicks_Recorded_LT__c) / Booked_Quantity__c),0),
"CPO" ,0,
"CPA" ,IF (Days_delivered__c > 0 && Booked_Quantity__c > 0, (Runtime_Days__c / Days_delivered__c) * ( Clicks_Recorded_LT__c / Booked_Quantity__c),0), 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Value is calculated based on the delivery data in salesforce.com and can differ from DFP
CustomField.label: OSI % (R)
